Compute Wasserstein-2 Distance Between Individuals

was2code_dist.Rd

Compute Wasserstein-2 Distance Between Individuals

Usage

was2code_dist(
  count_input,
  meta_cell,
  meta_ind,
  var_per_cell,
  var2test,
  ncores = 2,
  k = NULL,
  verbose = 0
)

Arguments

count_input

A count matrix (genes x cells)

meta_cell

Cell-level metadata including 'individual' and 'cell_id'

meta_ind

Individual-level metadata including 'individual' and test variable

var_per_cell

Variable to normalize per cell (e.g., "nCount_RNA")

var2test

Binary variable to test at the individual level

ncores

Number of cores to use for parallelization

k

Number of opposite-group individuals to compare each person with (default = NULL for all)

Value

A list of 3D distance arrays (one per gene)
